devdoc.details: Exchanges Dai <-> IdeaTokens using a bonding curve. Sits behind a proxy

params.maxCost: The maximum allowed cost in Dai to buy `amount` IdeaTokens
params.recipient: The recipient of the bought IdeaTokens
